price: Zar da Njemu ravnim smatraju one koji ne mogu ništa stvoriti, i sami su stvoreni,
arabic: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ayush'rikūna mā lā yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
